description: This file is a BitBake recipe snippet for building and deploying U-Boot bootloader images within a Yocto or Poky build environment. It contains variables, build functions, and install/deploy procedures specific to U-Boot configuration.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Compiles the U-Boot image based on machine and configuration, handling versioning and environment scripts.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the compiled U-Boot images and related environment files into specified directories, creating symlinks and handling multiple configurations.

methods.name: do_deploy
methods.description: Deploys the U-Boot images and environment files to the final deploy directory, creating symlinks and handling multiple configurations.
